All Classes

Class Description
AlertBox
this class create all the AlertBox during initialization and game
Apollo
Represents the god card: Apollo
ApolloController
Apollo's GodController
Artemis
Represents the god card: Artemis
ArtemisController
Artemis' GodController
Athena
Represents the god card: Athena
AthenaController  
Atlas
Represents the god card: Atlas
AtlasController
Atlas' GodController
BaseMiniController
Basic MiniController
Board
This class contains the set of tiles of a game and variable canGoUp is used to control Athena's God power.
BoardScene
this class create a scene with the board and the button God List where every player can read the name and the power of the god in the game.
BuildMessage
This abstract class represents all messages created in respond to a build choice performed by the player.
CanEndMiniController
This MiniController is used when the user can choose to end his phase.
CanEndTileMessage
This message is sent during a phase that can be ended by the Player (thanks to his/her God's power), so carries a normal list of positions and a CanEndMiniController
CheckDomeMessage
This message is created when the Player have to decide if the Building that will be positioned is going to be a Dome or a normal Construction.
CheckDomeMiniController
This MiniController is used when a player has ATLAS as god
ChosenGodMessage
This message is sent to every player that has to choose his/hers god card
ChosenMiniController
This MiniController checks the parsing of inputs during the initialization, when the player choose which god he wants to use.
Client
this abstract client class has been organized to made transparent all messages between client and server, independently which type of implementation is used in the client (CLI, GUI)
ClientCLI
this class implements client for CLI's version
ClientCliApp  
ClientGUI
this class implements client for GUI's version of the game using JavaFX 14
ClientGuiApp
this class is responsible for creating the threads used by Java FX
ClientGuiStart  
Color
this enumeration contais all escape codes to change color of Cli characters
Constructor
Represents a Constructor pawn.
Controller
This class is the controller of the application
Demeter
Represents the god card: Demeter
DemeterController
Demeter's GodController
EventHandler<T extends javafx.event.Event>  
ForcedDomeMessage
This message is created when a Dome is placed on the board forcefully.
GameMessage
This is the abstract class representing all the message that are generated within the MVC core of our project.
GameState
Represents the state of the Game, holding all the players, the player who's playing and the current phase of each turn
God
Represents the god card that every player choose at the start of the game.
GodController
Interface used to implement a Strategy Pattern regarding the special effect of the God card
GodRecapMessage
This is a special message.
HelpMessage
This is a utility class, and contains all the special Strings used multiple times through the project
Hephaestus
Represents the god card: Hephaestus
HephaestusController
Hephaestus' GodController
MiniController
This interface creates every class that allows to parse the input of the user directly on the client, without using the server
Minotaur
Represents the god card: Minotaur
MinotaurController
Minotaur's GodController
Model
This class is the model of the application
MoreCheckMiniController
This MiniController checks if the constructor chosen by the player can use the spacial power of his god
MoreTileToCheckMessage
This is a special TileToShow message.
MoveMessage
This abstract class represents all messages created in respond to a move choice performed by the player.
Observable<T>  
Observer<T>  
OrderGameMessage
This message is generated when the player must choose which of the participants should start
OrderMiniController
This MiniController selects the first player to start by parsing the input
Pan
Represents the god card: Pan
PanController
Pan's GodController
PickGodMessage
This message is generated when a player must choose all the god cards that will be available during the match
PickGodMiniController
This MiniController checks the input during the initialization part where the first player chooses 2/3 gods
Piece
this class manages the piece during the game
PieceType
enumeration of colors for the piece
PlaceFirstConstructorMessage
This message is generated whenever the player has to place one of his/hers constructors on the board.
Player
Represents the playing Player.
PlaySpace
this class contains two matrix to indicate the position of all buildings and constructor.
Position
This is an helper class used to represent the Position of Tiles or any Constructor
PosMessage
This is a special class created by the view only.
PossiblePhases
Enum class used to represent all the possible phase of each turn
Prometheus
Represents the god card: Prometheus
PrometheusController
Prometheus' GodController
PushMessage
This message is generated when a constructor pushes another one (generally done by Minotaur)
RemovedPlayerMessage
This message is generated when one of the player loses (no constructor can complete an entire turn).
SceneBuilder
this class create all the scenes
Server
This is the class that manages and creates all the connection to the Server.
ServerApp  
ServerMessage
This abstract class represents all the messages generated by the Server "directly" during the initialization of a match.
ServerMoveMessage
This is a special message created only during the initialization of a match after a player position one of his/hers constructors
ServerMoveMiniController
This is ServerMoveMiniController
SocketClientConnection
SocketClientConnection is a class used to decouple the Server from the actual connection: when a new Client connects to the Server the latter creates a new SocketClientConnection.
StandardBuildMessage
This message is the standard message created every time the player place a construction
StandardMiniController
This MiniController is used for every standard action
StandardMoveMessage
This message is the standard Move message, generated after a move from any player.
StandardTileMessage
The standard TileToShow message, it just carries a standard MiniController and a standard list of Positions
SwapMessage
This message is generated when a constructor swap with another one (generally done by Apollo)
Tile
This class represent every cell that the Board is composed of.
TileGui
this class is responsible for creating and updating the tiles on the BoardScene
TileToShowMessage
This abstract class represents all the messages that will be used to show to the user the possible moves/choices that he/she has.
View
This is the view of the application
WinMessage
This Message is created when a victory occur.
